name: Deep Dive-Ludum Dare 48
description:
Scuba diving at night… to the deep dark? What could go wrong?

Play as Scuba, an amateur scuba diver. He just bought his first boat and has gone out for his first scuba dive. After getting his feet wet, he’s decided he want’s to go deeper. Harpoon fish and earn enough money for the next submarine and continue your journey to the bottom of the ocean. You’ll be a professional in no time.

This was my first proper game, and I completed it within the Ludum Dare 48 (Compo). Amazing experience and really happy with the outcome from time spent.

I would love to expand upon this game, if that's something people would want. Leave your comments below and tell me what you think.
